backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend logic for SkillSwap: user profile management, skill exchange requests, in-platform messaging (restricted to accepted matches), ratings, and a skill directory with search — all gated by an access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each product feature (profile management, skill browsing, exchange matching, messaging, ratings) to the frontend/backend files and test IDs that implement them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of five key frontend source files (App.tsx, useRouter.ts, ConversationThread.tsx, Layout.tsx, HeroSection.tsx) for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point that defines CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens (background, foreground, primary, secondary, etc.) in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the SkillSwap SPA, mounting the React app into a root div and loading the Vite entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (home, directory, profile, user profile, dashboard, messages) and wraps them in a layout that conditionally shows the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ConversationThre: Messaging UI component that renders a scrollable thread of chat bubbles between two matched users, with polling-based refresh, Enter-to-send keyboard shortcut, and access-guard messaging for unmatched users.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page component displaying the authenticated user's active skill exchanges and incoming exchange requests, with navigation to message threads and a rating modal for exchange partners.
frontend/src/components/ExchangeRequests: Displays a list of pending incoming skill exchange requests for the current user, with each card showing sender info, skills being exchanged, and an accept button that triggers the accept mutation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a headline, description, explore/join buttons, stat badges, and a hero illustration image.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the app shell with a sticky header containing the logo, navigation links, authentication controls (login/logout), and a mobile menu toggle, wrapping page content as children.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePage.tsx: Full profile editing page that lets authenticated users view and update their name, bio, offered skills, and wanted skills, with inline skill form management and save/cancel controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Multi-step onboarding dialog for new users to create their profile by entering name, bio, and at least one offered and one wanted skill before submitting.
frontend/src/components/RatingModal.tsx: Dialog component that allows a user to submit a 1–5 star rating and optional text review for another user after a skill exchange.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsList.tsx: Displays a list of user reviews/ratings in a card, showing reviewer name, star rating, date, and review text. Fetches ratings and reviewer profiles via custom query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SkillDirectory.t: Renders a searchable directory of all user profiles and their offered skills, with debounced filtering by skill name, category, description, or user name.
Shows a detailed view of a user's profile including skills, average rating, reviews, and a skill-exchange request form with match detection against the logged-in user's profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity persistence via AuthClient, and a React context provider and hook for consuming auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including profile CRUD, skill search, exchange request management, messaging, and ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Re-exports and wraps TanStack Router utilities (useNavigate, Link) and provides a useLocation shim and a useNavigateTo helper for programmatic navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Fraunces, Inter), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a warm earthy OKLCH color palette with CSS variables for both light and dark themes, plus custom utility classes for skill tags and match glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/matchDetection.ts: Utility that detects complementary skill matches between two user profiles, returning pairs where each user offers what the other wants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color palettes (terracotta, sage, sand), Fraunces/Inter font families, custom border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing a peer-to-peer skill exchange web app, listing implemented features (profiles, search, matching, messaging, ratings), architectural notes, and image requirements.
